1370: Evergero moved to St. Ians straet.B.2 after marriage.
Got married to Mette at age 28 in 1370.
Had a son with Mette, Heyman, at age 28.
1372: Had a daughter with Mette, Sophia, at age 30.
1373: Had a daughter with Mette, Erkenradis, at age 31.
1375: Had a daughter with Mette, Segherarden, at age 33.
1376: Had a daughter with Mette, Aue, at age 34.
1377: Had a daughter with Mette, Oderada, at age 35.
1380: Became caretaker of Heyman, Sophia, Erkenradis, Segherarden, Aue, Oderada at age 39.
1385: Lost daughter Segherarden when Segherarden was 11 years old.
